column6: Enable custom FPS HUD, which will disable your default FPS HUD
Enable speedometer HUD
Send a private message to the player. Obviously admins can see this in server log.
Temporarily ignore and hide a player until your session ends or the map changes
Permanently ignore and hide a player
Unignore a player
Show your IP
Resets your current run
Places a reference target. Can be useful for invisible walls.
Show your playerId
Save your run with an optional label that is visible in your runs menu
Pause your currently active run
Resume your currently paused run. This loads your position back to your last safe saved position

Load your most recently unfinished run.
Using this command or reset command afterwards will archive the run!
List your unfinished runs for the current map.
Teleport to a player's current saved position. This will pause your run.
Teleport to a player's current location. This will pause your run.
Enable noclip or ufo with an optional speed. This will pause your run.
Enable speedmode. This will pause your run.
Show your current position
Mark your current run as using hard TAS. Save position for this to take effect.
Vote for a map, extend time or register your vote.

Mute a player for a specific time period or the end of their session.
This also hides the player from everyone.
Unmute a player
Kick a player with an optional reason
Restart the current map, useful for triggering an update of GSC code
Ban a player with an optional reason
Force rename a player to a new name

Teleport to an entity with a specific target name. For arrays, use the index to specify which entity.
This will pause your run.
Teleport to a specific position. This will pause your run.
Currently a debug command for future use in checkpointing
